extendedInfo.description: ****THE MOST ELECTRIFYING BASKETBALL GAME FINALY IS COMING ON YOUR MOBILE!****âââREVIEWSâââ- XDA-DEVELOPERS.COM 10.15.2012"...perfect solution for when you need to pass the time..."- BAIXAKI.COM.BR 10.03.2012"...Um game de basquete incrÃ­vel para quem quer se divertir no Android..."- ANDROIDTAPP.COM 10.04.2012"...If you like smart casual games that rely on accurate timing and skill, this is definitely worth checking out. Itâs pretty cool to get three baskets in one or a slam dunk so itâs certainly lots of fun..."- THEANDROIDGALAXY 10.01.2012"...Many challenges to come in a electrifying basketball game..."- WEBAPPRATER.COM 09.30.2012"...The game has lot many surprises than what you can think about..."- APP400.COM 10.01.2012"...an exhilarating basketball game...!- APPS4REVIEW.COM 10.01.2012"...There are a lot of elements all blended up very nicely to result into a product that is intuitive, sharp and beautiful as well..."- APPSMIRROR.COM 10.02.2012"... it is a lot of fun as it presents you with smooth and sophisticated graphics that interacts with you and wholly entertains you..."Space Ball is a fun and a âvery electricâ basketball game with many challenging modes, obstacles, and too many surprises. This game offers you four modes in each of them you will face increasing levels of difficulty and different backboard styles. The classic mode itâs a great start in which you can have lots of fun, you can discover how fun it is to be part of the Space Ball. The principle is simple and fun: use your finger, drag the aim to hit the ball in as many baskets as you can. You need to be fast to break any records!If you like action and basketball, this is the game for you. Jump in Space Ball android app, and have lots of fun hitting your ball and collecting lots of points!Turn all the baskets youâve ever wanted to. Become the ultimate bringer of Space Ball, conquer the space and show that you're the best. ****Space ball is the new way to play basketball as youâve never seen! With incredible backboards and lots of dunks, you will love to have fun with it.****A perfect game to blow off the steam, simple and addictive!"Compare your score with your friendsâ "FREE GAME!!!â¢ Many modesâ¢ Backboards with lots of fun featuresâ¢ Easy to playâ¢ Beautiful graphicsâ¢ Sweet interactionâ¢ Intuitive controlâ¢ Competitive scoreBecome a fan of Space Ball on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/pages/Space-Ball-Android-app/189487171185658Follow us on Twitter and receive the news from Space Ball!https://twitter.com/SpaceBalldreoDue to technical limitations, any device with 800Mhz or less will be unable to run Space Ball. Known devices include:HTC Wildfire SHuawei M865Samsung Galaxy YSamsung Galaxy AceLG Optimus OneHTC myTouch 3G SlideHTC ExplorerZTE X500ZTE BladeSamsung ReplenishLG AllySamsung Dart

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: This a very good/interesting game especially after me getting use to moving my phone back and forth for the little guy can move...plays good on the HTC...(update)now when I play time mode it shuts off (freezes) and goes to my main screen have to go to the game and start over still a good game with that glitch n it :/
